name: candidus
description: An approachable and minimalistic blogging theme for Ghost

scripts.ship: STATUS=$(git status --porcelain); echo $STATUS; if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then yarn version && git push --follow-tags; else echo "Uncomitted changes found." && exit 1; fi

enable_search.description: Enable built-in search for Ghost. Toggles the search icon in the header section

subscription_card_text.description: Additional text to display in the subscription card
subscription_card_text.default: Join our newsletter to receive the latest updates in your inbox

subscription_card_text_disabled.description: Additional text to display in the subscription card when subscription is disabled
subscription_card_text_disabled.default: We're getting ready to make newsletters available to you. Follow us on social media to be one of the first to subscribe

select_social_media_when_subscription_is.description: Icon to display in the subscription card. Used when subscription is disabled

social_media_url_when_subscription_is_di.description: Adds a clickable link to the subscription card. Used when subscription is disabled

subscription_card_image.description: Background image for your subscription card

select_homepage_banner_style.description: Style of the top homepage section

enable_table_of_contents.description: Enable / disable table of contents for posts

enable_post_reading_progress_bar.description: Enable / disable post reading progress bar

enable_bookmarks.description: Enable / disable bookmarks for posts. This feature is only available for desktop screens

enable_chatgpt.description: Enable / disable sending the current article to ChatGPT and allow users to ask questions

show_related_posts.description: Enable / disable related posts below the current article

post_subscription_cta_text.description: Text to display in the subscription section below the current article
